Improve this resume bullet:
""Job Title: Virtual Marketing Assistant & Market AnalystJob Overview: We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Virtual Marketing Assistant to join our team and support our boat charter business, vacation rental marketing, and remodeling company. The ideal candidate will have a passion for marketing, excellent communication skills, and a creative mindset to help promote our services across various platforms. This individual will also play a pivotal role in conducting thorough market research and analysis to inform our strategic marketing decisions across our platforms.Marketing Assistant Responsibilities:1. Manage and grow social media accounts for our boat charter business, vacation rentals, and remodeling company, including Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and Pinterest.2. Create engaging written and visual content for social media posts, blog articles, website updates, and email newsletters to showcase our boats, vacation properties, and remodeling projects.3. Develop and implement online advertising campaigns on platforms like Google Ads and Facebook Ads to increase brand awareness, drive traffic, and generate leads.4. Monitor social media channels and respond to inquiries, comments, and messages promptly to engage with followers and potential customers.5. Collaborate with our team to develop marketing strategies, promotions, and special offers to attract customers and increase bookings and sales.6. Assist with website management, including content updates, SEO optimization, and user experience improvements to enhance online visibility and conversion rates.7. Track and analyze key performance metrics and provide regular reports and insights to evaluate the success of marketing efforts and make data-driven decisions.8. Stay up-to-date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in digital marketing to drive innovation and continuous improvement.Market Research and Analysis:1. Competitive Analysis: Conduct in-depth analysis of competitors within the boating, vacation rental, and remodeling industries. Identify key competitors, analyze their marketing strategies, pricing models, and customer engagement tactics. Provide insights and recommendations to differentiate our services and stay ahead of the competition.2. Trend Identification: Stay abreast of industry trends, consumer preferences, and emerging technologies in the boating, hospitality, and real estate markets. Monitor changes in consumer behavior, travel patterns, and home improvement trends to capitalize on new opportunities and adapt our marketing strategies accordingly.3. Market Segmentation: Identify and analyze target market segments for our boat charter services, vacation rentals, and remodeling projects. Segment audiences based on demographics, psychographics, and behavioral characteristics to tailor marketing messages and promotions for maximum impact and relevance.4. Property Market Analysis: Assist in analyzing market conditions and property trends for real estate investments, rental properties, and renovation projects. Evaluate property values, rental rates, and resale potential based on location, amenities, and market demand. Provide recommendations for investment opportunities and strategic property acquisitions.5. Data-driven Insights: Utilize data analytics tools and platforms to gather, organize, and interpret marketing data, customer feedback, and performance metrics. Generate actionable insights and reports to track the effectiveness of marketing campaigns, measure ROI, and identify areas for optimization and improvement.6. Strategic Planning: Collaborate with our marketing team to develop data-driven marketing strategies and action plans based on market research findings and analysis. Identify untapped market opportunities, niche audiences, and potential partnerships to drive business growth and expansion.Requirements:1. Proven experience in social media management, content creation, and online advertising, preferably in the travel, hospitality, or construction industries.2. Strong writing and editing skills with a keen eye for detail and creativity to produce compelling and engaging marketing materials.3. Proficiency in using social media management tools, email marketing platforms, and analytics tools to track and measure performance metrics.4. Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with team members, clients, and external partners in a remote work environment.5. Self-motivated and proactive with the ability to manage multiple tasks and deadlines independently while maintaining a high level of accuracy and quality.6. Knowledge of SEO principles, website optimization, and digital marketing strategies to enhance online visibility and drive organic traffic.7. Familiarity with boating, vacation rentals, or remodeling industries is a plus but not required.8. Bachelor's degree in marketing or related field is preferred.Hourly Range: $8.00-$25.00Posted On: February 13, 2024 20:09 UTCCategory: Social Media MarketingSkills:Social Media Marketing, Virtual Assistance, Marketing Strategy, Content CreationSkills: Social Media Marketing, Virtual Assistance, Marketing Strategy, Content CreationCountry: United States""

""Required Skills:-Proficiency in writing optimized and clean Python code, with a strong understanding of Python libraries and frameworks like Flask and FastAPI with at least 5 years of experience-Strong knowledge of PostgreSQL, including schema design, performance tuning, and advanced query optimization. Experience with other databases is a plus.-Demonstrable experience in developing and maintaining RESTful APIs, understanding of the principles of API design, and best practices.-Familiarity with web services and third-party integrations using various protocols (SOAP, REST).-Proficient in using version control systems, especially Git, and familiar with branching and merging strategies.-Experience in designing scalable architectures and optimizing applications for performance, particularly in high-volume data environments.-Proficiency in unit and integration testing, ensuring the robustness and reliability of backend services.-Awareness of secure coding practices, vulnerability assessment, and prevention techniques specific to web applications and databases.-Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.-Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, and willingness to adapt in a rapidly changing environment.-Writing highly performant, scalable, and efficient code in Python (Flask) with Postgres.-Experience in working with databases like Postgres.-Good knowledge of authentication using OAuth 2.-Experience in designing modern well-documented REST APIs (OAS) and API integration.-Building and shipping SaaS software.-Solid experience and background working with AWS services. Azure or GCP is also good.-Good communication skills working with email, chat, Google docs, phone, and tools such as Slack, Zoom etc.-Very comfortable reaching out and communicating with team members (both verbally and written) about engineering projects.-Identify and resolve bugs and issues across applications as they arise and self-test the fix/feature on local before sending PR as the first line of defense.-Ability to locate and leverage Python modules in-app or in open source.-Experience with automated unit testing-Fluency in written and verbal English-Ability to work North American business hours-Willing to pass a background check-Experience working remotely from home-Able to work ~40 hrs/week-Able and willing to provide referencesAbout Us:We are a small, rapidly growing Silicon Valley software company creating a state-of-the-art SaaS platform that provides data cleansing solutions for customer relationship management (CRM) software at massive companies. This engineer is a key member of the team designing and developing state-of-the-art applications and services by utilizing a variety of technologies. You will work both individually and as part of a team to create a seamless and easy-to-use experience for our customers while facilitating complex functionality within the application. You will be a part of a fast-paced, challenging, and exciting work environment. We are a certified Woman and Minority Owned Business.If you are who we are looking for please start the first line of your cover letter with “I AM A SENIOR PYTHON ENGINEER WITH 5+ YEARS OF EXPERIENCE” in all CAPSPreferred Skills (but not required):-Experience with at least one SaaS CRM system like Salesforce.com, Microsoft CRM/Dynamics, Oracle CRM On Demand, or SugarCRM and their APIs.-Strong proficiency in Github/Gitlab, implementing Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) build systems and Test Driven Development (TDD), Pipeline in an agile workflow.-Knowledge of app development and javascript/typescript frameworks: Vue or Vuetify/VueTailwind.-Implementing Containerized deployment and container orchestration using Docker and Kubernetes (or similar alternatives).-Agile/Scrum development experience is a plus.-Previous experience working for a US-based company.Who we are NOT looking for-Agencies-People who are looking for a side “hustle” or are starting their own business-Anyone with less than 5 years of experiencePosted On: February 13, 2024 20:09 UTCCategory: Back-End DevelopmentSkills:SOAP API, Git, Python, PostgreSQL, RESTful APISkills: SOAP API, Git, Python, PostgreSQL, RESTful APICountry: United States""

""You need to develop and implement a set of classes that represent the different elements that appear in a game. You are not developing the complete game, just the setting up, specific snapshots, and display of the game. You are required to write a 'level' editor for a simple game called MysteryWorld. A level in MysteryWorld is a room made up from 10 x 10 grid. Each cell in the room is referred to by the row and column number (coordinate).Game Specifications• A room in MysteryWorld can be populated by two types of entities: inanimate and animate entities.• There are two kinds of inanimate entities: stones which are represented by 'S' and holes which are represented by an 'O'. Holes also have a depth in meters represented by a number between 0 and 20. Expectedly, inanimate do not move.• Each living entity has a measure of its health, represented using an integer value between 0 and 100 and all the living entities can move. There are three types of living entities: dragons represented by the symbol #, human beings represented by @; and monsters represented by a ' * ‘ character. Each human being has a name, the monsters have strength represented by a number between 0 and 5.• All the animate objects can move and their health is usually reduced when they move.• Animate entities wandering around the worldo Humans: The humans always move to the cell to on their right, provided that this cell is not occupied and that they are not at the edge of the room. Otherwise they move to unoccupied randomly chosen cell adjacent to their current position. Their health is reduced by one every time that they move.o A dragon moves to a cell that is randomly chosen from those cells that are unoccupied, and adjacent to its current position. The health of the dragon is very volatile and is reduced by a random number between 0 and 5 every time it moves.o Monsters: A monster moves as many cells as its strength at any direction (up, down, left or right) as long as the destination is free and the monster remains within the room. For instance, the monster in position (9,3) in with strength 5 can move to position (9,8) but it cannot move to (4,3) because the cell is occupied, the monster cannot move to any other cell because it will reach the end of the room. In the case that there are not possible movements, the monster will move to a random empty cell next to it. The health is reduced as many points as the strength. In the unlikely event that all the possible options are invalid, the entity will not move. Furthermore, the default movement of all the living entities is to a random adjacent cell. You will work only with the console application to test your implementation. Code needs to have at least 3 classes: 1. Entity class: This is an abstract class which will act as the parent (base) class to all the different entities (Holes, Stones, Humans…) of the game.2. Room class: This is the class that stores the positions of all the entities. It should ideally contain the Methods to add entities, display the room, display information etc.3. Main class: This is the main class that handles the game. The menu will be implemented here and you will need to add the call to the specific actions.Functional Requirements1) The program should be a console application. The user interacts with the program by typing instructions into the standard input, and the program gives output by writing to the standard output.When the program starts, it should display the initial state of the game, and a menu. The initial state of the game should contain 2 holes, 2 stones, 3 monsters, 3 humans, 2 dragons, placed randomly in the room, with the constraint that two entities cannot occupy the same position. In the initial state, the depth of the holes is a random number between 0 and 20, monsters will be allocated a random strength between 0 and 5 and the three humans will be: Harold, David and Clare. All the animate entities are 100% healthy.2) The initial menu should offer the following options:1. Display Room2. Move all the animated entities3. Display the entity state by coordinates4. Reset the room5. Finish3) If the user selects ‘1’ from the menu, the state of the game should be displayed as shown in Figure 14) If the user selects ‘2’ from the menu, all the living entities should be moved according to the rules specified earlier.5) If the user selects ‘3’ from the menu, they should be prompted to specify a row, and a column, and then the properties of the entity at that position (if there is one) should be displayed, the output might be as follows:Entity properties:Type: humanName: HaroldHealth: 47If there is no entity in that cell, then your program should output a suitable message.6) If the user selects ‘4’ from the menu, then the state of the board should be reinitialised, in the manner described in functional requirements.7) If the user selects ‘5’ from the menu, then the program should terminate.Budget: $45Posted On: February 19, 2024 12:29 UTCCategory: Video Game DevelopmentSkills:C++Skills: C++Country: United Kingdom""

""I am writing to request your assistance in a data-related task that involves populating a CSV file with essential indicator information.### Guide for Filling Out the Indicator Information CSV File#### 1. ID_Indicators_Information- **Description**: Assign a unique, consecutive ID number to each row/indicator.- **Example**: If the last filled row has ID 10, the next row should have ID 11.#### 2. Indicator Name- **Description**: Enter the official name of the trading indicator.- **Example**: Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD).#### 3. Indicator Category- **Description**: Classify the indicator into a category like Confirmation, Exit, Volume, etc.- **Example**: If the indicator helps in confirming trade signals, categorize it as 'Confirmation'.#### 4. Parameters (1 to 10)- **Description**: Each parameter has three sub-columns: Default, Low, and High.- **Parameter_X_Default**: The default value used by the indicator.- **Parameter_X_Low**: The lowest value at which the indicator remains effective.- **Parameter_X_High**: The highest value the indicator can handle without being ineffective.- **Example**: For a Moving Average indicator, Parameter_1_Default might be 30, Parameter_1_Low might be 5, and Parameter_1_High might be 200.#### 5. Buffers- **Description**: Enter the buffer values associated with the indicator. Buffers are data arrays storing different values calculated by the indicator.- **Example**: If an indicator has two lines (like MACD), it might have two buffers, one for each line.#### 6. Notes- **Description**: Add any additional comments or observations about the indicator.- **Example**: 'This indicator works well in a trending market'.#### 7. Indicator Type- **Description**: Select the type of indicator from the dropdown list provided.- **Example**: 'Two Lines Cross', 'Zero Line Filter', etc.Posted On: February 20, 2024 12:01 UTCCategory: Data EntrySkills:Data Entry, Microsoft Excel, MetaTrader 5Skills: Data Entry, Microsoft Excel, MetaTrader 5Country: Saudi Arabia""

If they opt for the assistant, they will be asked which areas of the service provided they liked best and want to see mentioned in the review. These can be selected. Then the AITA will compose the review (via Open AI API) and present the result on the next page. This result can be copied to the clipboard by the user, so it can be used when placing the actual review on Google or Proven Experts (a review portal).The Figma: The design in figma was done in a simple manner. No components have been defined, no Auto-Layout, etc. However, the web app is very simple and consits only of four pages / steps.Responsiveness: The current design is meant for a mobile view and we would like to stick to that design in desktop and tablet view by making it appear like a form. Example:[REDACTED_URL] the smartphone, the header and footer of the wordpress page will need to be hidden from view, so that only the web app becomes visible.On desktop and tablet, the web app will appear like a form of the wordpress page.The Open AI integration: We already have a successful integration in place via Gravity Forms and their Open AI plugin. This could be used if you can make it work with the design.If you chose to use the existing Gravity Forms integration, the main challenge seems to get the result from the Open AI query to show up in our properly designed "page 3" instead of the Gravity Forms notification page (this is how it works out of the box after clicking submit).If you do not want to use Gravity Forms, we could run our own python script (which we would provide you) or use a different plugin.Page 2 functionality: We will need to be able to add or remove the selectable options in the Wordpress backend. The selectable boxes must either be flexibly arrange themselves a) in the lenght of each box according to text displayed and b) to minimize white space between boxes. ""Hello my names Chase, I'm looking for long term partners to be apart of building the largest location rental platform in the world.Oasis On Location is a location rental booking platform targeted at providing location options for film top production companies.We have a unique model that sets us apart from all of our competitors. All our major competitors such as Peerspace and Giggter are decentralized platforms that work by allowing location hosts to list their space on the platform and get bookings from the site traffic much like Airbnb. The problems with this model is it leaves our competitors with no control over their product quality, pricing, customer support, expansion and more.Oasis On Location on the other hand is a completely centralized platform. We source all of the locations on our platform directly from short term hosts leaving us the ability to offer universal customer support, higher quality control, pricing control, and several other unique abilities.To add to this we are currently developing an AI integration that will allow production companies to upload their whole script. From there the AI will decode the script of all the locations and how they are described and link it to our massive portfolio to automatically source options from each scene in the script. Once this is complete this innovation will make us by far the most versatile and functional location rental platform currently on the market.Another massive advantage we have over our competition is full control over our expansion. We partner with top rental companies and acquire hundreds or even thousands of properties at a time. Since the start of 2024 we have brought on over 7,000 Film Locations, 4,000+ Yachts, and 2,000+ Cars, from the outreach force of just one agent.Our goal is simple. We want to be the largest location rental company in the world and with our strategy we are around [REDACTED_PHONE] good connections away from doing that.To achieve our goal we are looking to build a team of highly effective and motivated sales professionals to perform to key tasks in the company:POSITION 1 - New Location Outreach: This may possibly be the easiest sales job ever… or at least the easiest thing I’ve ever sold by far. Our service has no upfront cost, the short term host has the ability to accept or dismiss any booking and once they say yes we list all their spaces for them. Simply put, there is no way for an owner to lose money or time, there is only something to gain. With this offer I have historically received a 15%-25% positive response rate on cold outreach… meaning 1-3 people out of 10 don’t just respond but they respond with a positive go ahead to use the location or locations for film. Another key point is since the offer is so non-invasive and beneficial, if the owner has several properties or even thousands we can usually acquire all of them at once.Compensation: We have three compensation levels for agents that source new properties1 - 99 Locations = 30% of all profits from the locations for life[REDACTED_PHONE] Locations = 40% of all profits from the locations for life1000+ Locations = 50% of all profits from the locations for lifePOSITION 2 - New Member Outreach: The second key position needed is outreach agents to find new production companies and location scouts to use our services. This requires a simple outreach explaining the service and that we offer FREE location sourcing. From there the goal is to get them to create a FREE account on our site and start booking rentals.Compensation: As payment for finding new members the responsible Oasis Agent will receive a lifetime 10% commission on the profits from any rental said production company ever books through the Oasis On Location platform.We have designed our compensation structure to be very lucrative for building significant long term passive income for an elite select few. BOTH POSITIONS ARE COMMISSION ONLY + BENEFITS.Since the conversation rates of our offer are so high we do not need a massive team to complete the goal. We are looking for 2-3 new location outreach agents and 2-3 new member outreach agents to become long term valued partners in the company.This job allows you to pick your own hours and work from any location. There is no mandatory minimum number of hours worked per month, however we are looking for individuals who are motivated and committed to achieving our ultimate goal.Check Us Out At: Oasisonlocation.comLooking forward to hearing back from all interested parties!Hourly Range: $30.00-$80.00Posted On: February 17, 2024 07:59 UTCCategory: Sales & Business DevelopmentSkills:Sales, Lead Generation, Marketing StrategySkills: Sales, Lead Generation, Marketing StrategyCountry: United States""
